::Slayer::

Slayer frowns, thinking that Ignatius's logic was flawed, but he 
didn't argue. After all, that was the only reasonable plan they had 
had yet.

"Allright. What do I do, just fly up to them?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius fealt sure of himself. "The Maximals have been beat on 
lately. They
> most likely wouldn't risk more injuries with a counterattack." he 
looked
> over the map from his last flight into Maximal territory, "The 
injuries plus
> the fact that they don't know that four of our number is missing 
lower the
> odds even further that we'll be followed back to
